t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    out = 0
    m = -1
    for i in range(1, n):
        c = arr[i]
        if c >= m:
            m = c
            out = i - c
        else:
            out += 1
    print(out + 1)

    inp = input()

    inp = input()

    listInt = list(map(int, inp))
    maxInt = max(listInt)
    max_non_pre = n - maxInt
    print(max_non_pre)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    count = 0
    x = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] > x:
            count = a[i] - x
            x = count
    count = n - a[n - 1]
    print(count)

from sys import stdin
stdint = lambda : int(stdin.readline())
seq = lambda : list(map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split()))
for i in range(stdint()):
    a = stdint()
    arr = seq()
    m = max(arr)
    print(a - m)

t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    li = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    for i in li:
        ans = max(ans, i)
    print(n - ans)
